abilities.name: VOIDBORN
abilities.description: Nebulae do not affect your ships' movement.

abilities.name: AETHERPASSAGE
abilities.description: After a player activates a system, you may allow that player to move their ships through systems that contain your ships.

abilities.name: DARK WHISPERS
abilities.description: During setup, take the additional Empyrean faction promissory note; you have 2 faction promissory notes.

flagship.name: Dynamo
abilities: After any player's unit in this system or an adjacent system uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE, you may spend 2 influence to repair that unit.

mech.name: Watcher
abilities: You may remove this unit from a system that contains or is adjacent to another player's units to cancel an action card played by that player.

base.name: Dark Pact
base.effect: ACTION: Place this card face up in your play area. When you give a number of commodities to the Empyrean player equal to your maximum commodity value, you each gain 1 trade good. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Empyrean player's units, return this card to the Empyrean player.
base.returnCondition: If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Empyrean player's units, return this card to the Empyrean player.

alternate.name: Blood Pact
alternate.effect: ACTION: Place this card face up in your play area. When you and the Empyrean player cast votes for the same outcome, cast 4 additional votes for that outcome. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Empyrean player's units, return this card to the Empyrean player.
alternate.returnCondition: If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Empyrean player's units, return this card to the Empyrean player.

base.name: Acamar
base.ability: After a player moves ships into a system that does not contain any planets: You may exhaust this card; that player gains 1 command token.

base.name: Xuange
base.unlockCondition: Be neighbors with all other players
base.ability: After another player moves ships into a system that contains 1 of your command tokens: You may return that token to your reinforcements.

base.name: Conservator Procyon
base.ability: ACTION: Place 1 frontier token in each system that does not contain any planets and does not already have a frontier token. Then, explore each frontier token that is in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships. Then, purge this card.
